item.title: Android Jetpack Navigation Pitfalls & Tricks
item.description: Table of content Send Args to fragments within activities Use startActivityForResult with the Navigation library Use generic naming for action names Reuse fragments in multiple navigation graphs TLDR Further readings Navigation library from Jetpack offers a great variety of helpful tools, especially with the SafeArgs extension. My last project contained many different navigation flows paired with a large number of screens, so I decided to try the new navigation library which had just reached a stable release.
